<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output omit-xml-declaration="yes" indent="yes"/>
<xsl:template match="/"> <root> <xsl:for-each select="//table2/DocumentElement/Row"> <xsl:for-each select="//table1/DocumentElement/Row[Moref=substring-after(current()/Managed_x0020_Object_x0020_Reference, 'VirtualMachine-') and not(substring-after(current()/State,'powered')=PowerState)]"> <xsl:copy-of select="."/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </root> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
